summary: Three men go hunting rabbits during a hot day. Heat and talking about events happened in the past make them angry, until they go totally crazy.
cast: Ismael Merlo|Alfredo Mayo|José María Prada|Emilio Gutiérrez Caba|Fernando Sánchez Polack|Violeta García|María Sánchez Aroca|Gene Wesson
title: La caza
